aboutus.aboutus_para: Discover the CLé fashion point of view with our edit of over 650+ established and innovative designers, from Prada, Gucci and Balenciaga to Saint Laurent, Halpern and Wales Bonner. We aim to be the most personal luxury shopping experience in the world – whether you join us online, via our app or at our pioneering retail and broadcasting destination.
